DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To study effect fast food-based hyper-alimentation liver enzymes hepatic triglyceride content ( HTGC ) metabolism . Design : Prospective interventional study parallel control group . Setting University Hospital Link√∂ping , Sweden . Participants : 12 healthy men six healthy woman mean ( SD ) age 26 ( 6.6 ) year match control group . Intervention : Subjects intervention group aim body weight increase 5-15 % eat least two fast food-based meal day goal double regular caloric intake combination adoption sedentary lifestyle four week . Main outcome measure : Weekly change serum aminotransferase HTGC measure proton nuclear magnetic resonance-spectroscopy baseline intervention .
DOC.brief_title: How Does 4 Weeks Increased Fast Food Intake Affect Metabolism ?
DOC.criteria: Healthy nonobese subject General diseases , obesity .
